mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure all text is legible without zooming on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and use lazy loading to speed up the page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more meta descriptions and improve keyword targeting throughout the site.
userExperienceTip: Make navigation even more intuitive with sticky headers or better organization of menus.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps needed to complete a reservation.
tips: Improve loading times for better user retention.
Optimize SEO to increase search engine visibility.
